      • complexQuery

        public <T> java.util.List<WordResult> complexQuery(java.util.Map<DatamuseParam.Code,java.lang.String> options)
                                            throws DatamuseException,
                                                   java.io.IOException
        Find words which are "like", for complex queries
        Parameters:
        options - a map of the user supplied query options.
        Returns:
        A list of words/phrases which are related to the query.
        Throws:
        DatamuseException - if there is a validation issue or a non HTTP-200 response is returned
        java.io.IOException - if there is a general issue with the rest call
